title: Set shop branding (Marward Sweets Pilani), add Instagram link, and add owner controls to add sweets & update prices

requirements.text: Update all visible shop branding text from the generic name (e.g., "Rajasthan Sweets") to "Marward Sweets Pilani" across the header, footer, and landing/home content.

quotes: Shop name is marward sweets pilani

acceptanceCriteria: Header brand text shows "Marward Sweets Pilani".
Footer brand text and copyright line use "Marward Sweets Pilani".
No user-facing text displays "Rajasthan Sweets" as the shop name anywhere in the app.

requirements.text: Display the shop Instagram contact using the exact Instagram ID "marward_sweets_pilani" and link it to https://instagram.com/marward_sweets_pilani (open in a new tab with safe rel attributes). Replace placeholder social links that currently use "#" with a working Instagram link at minimum.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer Instagram icon/link navigates to https://instagram.com/marward_sweets_pilani.
Instagram link opens in a new tab and includes rel="noopener noreferrer".
The Instagram handle is shown somewhere in the UI as "@marward_sweets_pilani" (English UI text).

requirements.text: Add backend support for owner catalog management: persist sweets as a mutable collection and implement authenticated, owner-only methods to (1) add a new sweet and (2) update the price of an existing sweet.

quotes: And I own change the price and add sweet

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes an update-price method that changes the stored price for a specified sweet and is reflected in subsequent getAllSweets calls.
Backend exposes an add-sweet method that appends a new sweet to the stored catalog and is reflected in subsequent getAllSweets calls.
Both mutations are owner-only (non-owner callers are rejected/ignored with a clear error result).
Sweets data remains available after page refresh (i.e., not purely in-memory within a single request).

requirements.text: Add an owner UI to manage the sweets catalog: after signing in, the owner can (1) add a new sweet (name, description, category, price, image path) and (2) update the price for an existing sweet. Ensure the catalog UI updates after successful changes.

quotes: And I own change the price and add sweet

acceptanceCriteria: There is a clear navigation entry (or button) to reach an "Owner"/"Manage Catalog" screen.
The owner screen requires Internet Identity sign-in; unauthenticated users are prompted to sign in.
The owner screen prevents non-owners from performing add/update actions and shows an English error message if attempted.
After adding a sweet, it appears in the Catalog page without a hard refresh (React Query invalidation/refetch is triggered).
After updating a price, the updated price appears in Catalog and Sweet Details views without a hard refresh.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any path listed in frontend.immutablePaths (compose them instead).
Use English for any user-facing text.
Instagram ID must be exactly: marward_sweets_pilani.
nonGoals: Implementing third-party social media APIs or embedding Instagram feeds.
Implementing payments, checkout, or delivery ordering flows.

goalsToAdd: Brand the app as "Marward Sweets Pilani" and show Instagram contact @marward_sweets_pilani.
Enable owner to add sweets and update sweet prices from the app.
